typed-items: Apprentice, UI/UX Designer, Fullstack Developer, Mobile Developer
profil_about_2: Full stack developer (apprenticeship, BUT Computer Science)
about_1: Passionate about IT and currently an apprentice at IUT Sophia, I work in a company on the development and migration of web and mobile applications, mainly around PHP/Symfony, Java, Kotlin and Swift technologies.
about_2: I work on all layers of development, from backend (API, database, system administration) to frontend (UI/UX, web integration, design), as well as project management and technical support.
about_3: Curious, adaptable, and comfortable in demanding environments, I keep learning and take part in both creating new tools and optimizing existing architectures. My experience also includes work in cleaning companies, which taught me versatility, rigor, and good people skills.
resume_subtitle: My background, experience, and key skills.
resume_valiance_erp: ERP migration and evolution: Gradual refactoring of legacy code (Symfony 1.4 ➔ 4 ➔ 7). Building hybrid bridges to ensure service continuity for clients.
resume_valiance_web: Web & mobile development: Fullstack features (API, client modules, UI). Porting an Android Java app to Kotlin, and starting iOS with Swift.
resume_valiance_sys: System administration & infrastructure: Installation, maintenance, securing of local/OVH servers. QNAP NAS management, RAID, backups.
resume_valiance_docs: Building HTML/CSS templates for customized quotes/invoices.
resume_valiance_support: Technical support: one-off interventions, client support, ticket management.
resume_valiance_team: Team participation: documentation, project management, client meetings.
resume_monaclean_desc: Discovering the professional environment: shadowing engineers, learning about technical and business roles (scheduling, sales, field work, accounting).
services_subtitle: Find here my areas of expertise, from development to business app modernization.
services_web_desc: Building modern web applications, frontend and backend, in PHP, Symfony, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, API and databases.
services_mobile_desc: Migrating and creating mobile applications in Java, Kotlin, Swift, with intuitive and connected interfaces.
services_legacy_desc: Refactoring and migrating old software: audit, adaptation, creating bridges, and keeping them running.
services_sysadmin_desc: Installing, configuring and monitoring QNAP, OVH, Linux servers, and setting up backups.
services_doc_desc: Developing HTML/PDF templates for invoices, quotes, and work orders tailored to small businesses.
services_support_desc: Helping small businesses with digital transformation: training, documentation, workflow optimization.
portfolio_subtitle: A concrete overview of my journey: Web, Mobile and Video Game Development
portfolio_steam_desc: Full stack with MongoDB 7 & Mongo Express on Docker. Automation scripts (PowerShell/Bash) for one-shot JSON/NDJSON data import.
portfolio_steam2_desc: Management and structuring of a Steam database under Docker.
portfolio_solar_desc: Interactive solar system simulation controlled by hand movements (Computer Vision). Explore space without touching the keyboard.
portfolio_valorant_desc: Tactical FPS mini-game inspired by Valorant. Shooting management, fluid movement, and competitive gameplay mechanics.
portfolio_erp_desc: Migration and overhaul of a legacy ERP (Symfony 1.4 → 4 → 7), building hybrid bridges.
portfolio_rpg_desc: Full development of an RPG in Java: architecture, basic AI, graphic rendering.
portfolio_idle_desc: Web idle game (HTML/CSS/JS) with progression and local save.
portfolio_pong_desc: Recreation of Pong in Python. First project of my life (2018).
portfolio_zombie_desc: C console game: grid movement and combat against AI.
portfolio_music_desc: Mobile app (Android/iOS): playlist management, audio player, API integration.
portfolio_pendu_desc: Web Hangman game hosted on Docker, auto-deployed with GitLab CI.
portfolio_rollaball_desc: Unity mini-game, C# scripts, collision and scoring management.
contact_subtitle: For any question or collaboration, feel free to contact me.
contact_form_sent: Your message has been sent. Thank you!
